title: manasu karagi
sahitya:
manasu karagi amrtadhAra varSamu varSimpu guhA nI



anupallavi



 ghana vAhana sudhA ramaNA kArtikEyA karuNAkarA nI



caraNam



 nara mrgAdi sakala jIva rAshulakA-dhAramaina sthira nadulu taTAkambula divya vAriniNDa cEsi

 sarasa gAna shAsramunu nI caraNa bhaktiyunu kalilO varamani shUpinci brOvu varadA harikEsha tanayA nI
